ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T13:39:19 [Issue ID 4000-9414] urn:comicvine:4000-9414 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:47:34. [Issue ID 21049]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Heavy-Matter Eagle: Mindor's description of a bird of "condensed atoms" that can smash through stone walls as if they were cheese.
Terror in Tallplace Town! Part I: A refugee tribe storms from a tunnel to take over N'Yark. Samson sweeps them back, but they include women and children: a tribe on the move! Samson feeds them. They came from Staten Island because invaders pushed them out. Mindor finds the Staten Island Ferry and they venture forth. Killer Kull, now "King Kull", driven from N'Yark and Jerz, has taken over "Tallplace Town", high-rise buildings. His men attack Samson but flee. How to stop Kull?
Mental "Treasure" Hunt: Tom and Cindia shop, but the food manufacturing machine breaks down. People panic. Workers search for an ancient food emporium buried beneath the city. Tom mentally searches through time to find the storehouse. But he's "blind", so Cindia directs him as they search. He locates the spot and mentally steers the workers to it. The city can eat while the machine is repaired. And Tom's secret is still safe.
[Terror in Tallplace Town!] Part II: King for a Day: Samson bounds over flat-top trees to brace King Kull, but battles a Gorillasaur. Kull's men snatch Sharmaine and Mindor. Mindor is forced to fix a ray-rifle for Kull. Kull zaps Samson, but he survives a plunge into jungle. Samson hops around and gets behind Kull. Kull is smacked to the depths and the Gorillasaur. The refugees can return home, as so our heroes.
ComicInfo.Title: Heavy-Matter Eagle; Terror in Tallplace Town! Part I; Mental "Treasure" Hunt; [Terror in Tallplace Town!] Part II: King for a Day
